item.title: Flights in Afghanistan grounded after internet shutdown
item.description: The Taliban have yet to give an official reason for the shutdown, but said it would last indefinitely.

item.title: Chinese woman convicted after 'world's biggest' bitcoin seizure
item.description: UK police seized crypto worth over Â£5bn from Zhimin Qian, who was known as 'the goddess of wealth'.

item.title: Three dead, dozens trapped after Indonesian school collapses on students
item.description: The rescue was temporarily halted on Tuesday as authorities say the building is at risk of further collapse.

item.title: Entire Ukrainian family killed in Russian drone strike, officials say
item.description: The bodies of two young boys and their parents were recovered from their destroyed home in the Sumy region, rescuers say.

item.title: Former aide to far-right German politician jailed for spying for China
item.description: Jian Guo had worked in Brussels for five years for Maximilian Krah, while he was a member of the European Parliament.
